page.title: 12Lotus Shoe Factory.
page.content: Lotus was built in 1901,84 years ago. There are 618 people employed there. Each day they make 10,000 pairs of shoes,that's 50,000 pairs a week!The staff work 8 hours and a half each day including lunch time. All the leather Lotus uses comes from Italy ,and 80% of each shoe consists of man made material.Every year they go to shoe exhibitions to see the latest styles. There are two other Lotus factories at Northampton and in Ireland. My dad works at Lotus.He puts the soles on the shoes.Their biggest competition comes from the Clarks shoe factory . Tracey Jones aged 9
